What it is

Financial protection is a key part of sound financial planning. The phrase typically refers to insurance products that pay a lump sum or regular income if a person dies, is diagnosed with a serious illness or becomes unable to work due to an illness or accident. These are respectively known as Life Insurance, Critical/Serious Illness Cover and Income Protection.

Why it matters

Money is not the answer to all of life’s difficulties – but preventing financial hardship and worry at a time of illness or bereavement can make such a big difference. Getting the right insurance in place could be the most important financial decision you ever make.

Our approach

We give tailored protection advice that reflects the individual needs and budget of our clients; and arrange quality financial protection from a panel of leading insurers.  Our goal is that clients are as well prepared as possible for their journey to a brighter financial future.
